definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Yad entrance mine market both showed a high consolidation positive trend.
sentences.chinese: 連日來進口礦市場皆呈現出高位盤整向上的趨勢。

sentences.english: Internal transfers will usually be completed in two-three business day.
sentences.chinese: 轉帳一般需要二到三個工作日來全部處理完畢。

sentences.english: It must have looked and sounded like the end of the world.
sentences.chinese: 肯定好像世界末日來臨了一樣。

sentences.english: Foreign - funded enterprises over the past few days have been close-out cigarettes on the deal.
sentences.chinese: 連日來外資企業已紛紛對香菸進行清倉處理。

sentences.english: How bout a full match of badminton next Sunday?
sentences.chinese: 下週日來場羽毛球賽如何？

sentences.english: I am following with great concern the tragic events of recent days in Nigeria.
sentences.chinese: 對於近日來發生在尼日利亞的慘案，我深表關切。

sentences.english: Five rogue days were tacked on the end of the cycle to complete the solar year.
sentences.chinese: 在每個太陽年年尾，會用5個機動日來補全。

sentences.english: Urges you to be quick in a seductive voice, we compete today.
sentences.chinese: 嬌聲嬌氣催你快，咱們本日來角逐。

sentences.english: The quake was the second to shake the Tokyo area in as many days.
sentences.chinese: 這場地震是連日來第二場發生在東京周邊的地震。

sentences.english: Their brothers in their villages had to come from time to time and share their duties for seven-day periods.
sentences.chinese: 他們的族弟兄住在村莊，每七日來與他們換班。

sentences.english: In recent days, Qiongshan City to take a major move to prefectural city Fengxiang Road correlation.
sentences.chinese: 連日來，瓊山市採取大動作，對府城鳳翔路進行整容。

sentences.english: These days we often hear about "the classless society".
sentences.chinese: 近日來我們經常聽到“無階級社會”的說法。

sentences.english: You should have acupuncture every other day. Sleep on a hard bed and rest well.
sentences.chinese: 此外，您要隔日來針刺一次，睡硬板牀，好好休息。

sentences.english: We should often utilize Sundays to read reference books.
sentences.chinese: 我們應時常利用星期日來閱讀參考書。

sentences.english: This is done in astronomy, with the help of the julian day .
sentences.chinese: 天文學上就是藉助儒略日來算的。

sentences.english: But Haitians ravenous from days without nourishment say the food is not nearly enough.
sentences.chinese: 但對連日來缺乏營養的海地人說，食品遠遠不夠。
